title: About
content:
We are a small software development outfit located in Northern California. We are passionate about the social media space and are excited to build software for creators. Why? Because we are creators. Our small team is full of people who podcast, stream, write, and create videos. We've all experienced the pain and struggle of growing and managing a social media presence. Our shared pain can be solved with software and we have the skill set to build it.
